entry.title: About me
entry.content:
My name is Ziheng Zhang and I was born in Beijing, China.

张子恒，生于中国北京。

Education

I attended high school at Beijing No. 4 High School in 2016 and entered the Higher Institute of Technology at Beihang University in 2019. My undergraduate major is Electronic Information Engineering.

2016年于北京市第四中学就读高中，2019年考入北京航空航天大学高等理工学院。本科专业为电子信息工程

Research

I completed several research assignments and competitions with Prof. Kuangyu Zheng and other members of his group during my undergraduate years, and published two articles.

本科期间随郑旷宇老师及其小组其他成员完成多项科研任务和比赛，并发表两篇文章。

CV.pdf
